data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Describe a time when you made a quick judgment and regretted it later. Include specific details in your answer."
data.answer: When I was in the final year of my university, I was struggling between a number of tasks, including hunting for a job, beating the deadline of my assignments, preparing for graduation, and a few other issues. Hence, there was a time when I felt I was unable to submit one assignment on time. Therefore, I applied for an extension with the cost of 15% of my final mark deduction. However, I regretted this decision soon because it pulled down my GPA in general, which has a negative effect on my job-hunting process. I believe I could have finished it on time if I worked really hard. (109 字)
